mdx.excerpt: We're incredibly pleased to announce the 2nd major release of Gatsby! Gatsby is a blazing fast modern website and app generator. Thousands of developers use Gatsby to create amazing blogs, apps, marketing and ecommerce sites, documentation, and more!
